import {React, useState } from "react" import "./Nomination.css" import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' function Nomination(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Nominations
  • {props.nomination}
    •      ); } export default Nomination;
